column18: description

Located in Madrid, 1.4 miles from Chamartin Station, Hotel Pinar Plaza provides accommodations with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms contain an electric tea pot, while selected rooms contain a balcony and others also offer city views. At Hotel Pinar Plaza each room includes bed linen and towels.
The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. At Hotel Pinar Plaza you'll find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested.
Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is 3.2 miles from the hotel, while IFEMA Convention Center is 3.8 miles away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 5.6 miles from Hotel Pinar Plaza.

column4: AC Hotel Madrid Feria by Marriott
column17: AC Hotel Madrid Feria by Marriott
column18:
This modern hotel is located just 5 minutes’ drive from Madrid’s Campo de las Naciones. On week days it offers a free shuttle to IFEMA Congress Center and the Palacio Municipal de Congresos, located 5 minutes away.
The elegant rooms at AC Hotel Madrid Feria feature parquet floors and smart décor. Each one comes with flat-screen satellite TV, a mini-bar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in all areas.
The hotel’s AC Lounge serves a range of Spanish and international food, as well as a good selection of wines, snacks and drinks.
The hotel has a free 24-hour fitness center. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Madrid. They can also reserve tennis or padel courts or arrange reservations at El Olivar de Hinojosa Golf Course.
Madrid’s Barajas Airport is a 10-minute drive from the hotel, and there is easy access to the M-40 Motorway. San Lorenzo Metro Station connects you with central Madrid in around 20 minutes. Ciudad Deportiva del Real Madrid Sport Complex is a 10-minute drive from the hotel.
Shuttle service upon availability.

Set in Madrid city center, Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only offers accommodations only 15 minutes’ walk away from Chueca, known by its LGBT atmosphere and welcoming entertainment offer, the hotel is hetero-friendly too.
Every stylish room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. The rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer.
Axel Hotel Madrid offers a restaurant where you can enjoy a modern approach to the local food. There is a roof-top terrace with its sky bar and a pool with stunning city view. A Cocktail bar can be found at this property as well.
Plaza Mayor is 1969 feet from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only, while Atocha train station is 15 minutes’ walk away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 8.1 mi from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only.

Elba Madrid Alcalá is ideally located between the city center and Madrid IFEMA congress center.
All the spacious rooms offer plenty of natural light, high-speed WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries.
Located on the ground floor, the restaurant offers Mediterranean food and local dishes. There is also a café bar and a dining room. Buffet breakfast is served daily.
Restaurants and shops can be found within walking distance, but the Elba Madrid Alcalá is also located 5-minutes’ walk away from the metro station Ciudad Lineal, offering access to the city center in 15 minutes.

The Juan Bravo Apartments are situated in the exclusive Salamanca district of Madrid and feature a communal swimming pool, open in summer. Diego de León Metro Station is located across from the apartments.
The complex conveniently includes a 24-hour front desk. The apartments and studios are arranged around the pool, and there is also a small garden and patio.
All accommodations include a lounge area and TV. Apartamentos Juan Bravo feature a kitchenette equipped with a microwave and fridge. They also have a private bathroom.
Many bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the surrounding streets.
The M30 and M40 Motorways are just a 2-minute drive from the apartments, providing easy access to other cities. Barajas Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Parking is available on site for an extra fee.

Gran Hotel Versalles is in a quiet area of central Madrid, next to Alonso Martínez Metro Station. It is a classic-style hotel offering a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi.
The Versalles is just a 5-minute walk from the vibrant Chueca district. Alonso Martínez is a major metro station and from here you can reach the Art Triangle in around 15 minutes.
The air-conditioned rooms at the Versalles Gran Hotel feature carpeted floors. They come with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.
The hotel’s Café Luxemburgo offers tapas and drinks throughout the day. There are various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

Located 1 minute's walk from Plaza de España Metro Station on Gran Via, Dear Hotel Madrid offers boutique accommodations in central Madrid. The hotel features a rooftop plunge pool, terrace and restaurant.
Featuring free high-speed WiFi, each stylish bright room is air-conditioned and fitted with a 40-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All the spacious rooms are soundproofed and include a safe, a mini-bar with free mineral water, a speaker for smartphones, and tea and coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms include a rain shower, bathrobe, slippers and exclusive free toiletries.
Set on the 14th floor, the Nice to Meet You Restaurant & Lounge offers contemporary and cosmopolitan cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere. Guests can enjoy cocktails and music, with spectacular panoramic views of Madrid. An exclusive buffet breakfast is also offered.
Other services available include a room service.
You can walk to Royal Palace of Madrid in 10 minutes. Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor are a 15-minute walk. Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas is 13 mi away.

Located in the heart of Madrid, Emperador is set next to Madrid’s Gran Vía. This elegant hotel offers a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and terrace with fantastic city views.
The elegant and stylish rooms offer accommodations with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with marble floors.
Emperador is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Royal Palace and Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square. Santo Domingo, Plaza de España and Callao Metro Stations are within a 3-minute walk, connecting you with the famous Art Triangle in just 15 minutes.
Open from May to September, the Emperador offers a seasonal swimming pool and solarium with sun loungers. The cocktail-bar located at the terrace features with views of the Royal Palace, Almudena Cathedral and Gran Vía Avenue.
The hotel has a lobby bar with a permanent art-gallery offering temporary exhibitions. There is a variety of restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the Emperador.
Other useful facilities at the hotel include a hairdressing salon and a 24-hour reception.

Located 984 feet from Madrid’s Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor Square, Hotel Cortezo has a rooftop terrace overlooking the city. This chic hotel offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.
Rooms at Hotel Cortezo have simple, elegant décor, with hardwood floors. All rooms include air conditioning and flat-screen TVs.
The Hotel Cortezo serves a varied American-style buffet breakfast including a gluten-free corner, and there is an on-site café and bar. There are also many characteristic tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, in the popular Plaza Santa Ana Square and La Latina district.
The museums of Madrid’s Art Triangle are all less than 15 minutes’ walk from Hotel Cortezo. Atocha AVE Train Station is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Tirso de Molina Metro Station is just 328 feet away.

ARTIEM Madrid is located in Madrid’s commercial center, a 15-minute drive from Barajas Airport. Free WiFi is provided.
Rooms are comfortable and spacious. All have air conditioning, satellite TV, and living area with a desk, as well as a private bathroom with a rainshower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.
Breakfast is served in The Slow Lounge, while a selection of food and drinks is available in the hotel's 24-hour The Green.
Bus and Metro stops can be found within walking distance. The nearest Metro stop is Barrio de la Concepción, just 1640 feet away.
The hotel has easy road access to Barajas Airport and IFEMA events center is 3.1 mi away from the property. Santiago Bernabeu football stadium is just 2.2 mi away. There is parking with direct access to the hotel.

Centrally located, One Shot Prado 23 offers design-rooms with TV, and free Wi-Fi. Just 492 feet from Plaza Santa Ana Square, the hotel is a 7-minute walk from Puerta del Sol.
Fitted with wooden flooring, each soundproof room features modern, functional décor. The mirror TV has a HDMI connection. The bathroom has a large rain-effect shower, and there is also a safe, an à la carte mini-bar and a dressing area.
A breakfast is served at a nearby bar every day, and there are plenty of places to eat out in the surroundings. You can find Latina District nearby, it's popular for its traditional tapas bars in a 10-minute walk.
The famous Reina Sofía Museum is 0.6 mi away, while the Thyssen Museum is only 656 feet away. The Prado Museum is 1640 feet away, and charming Retiro Park can be reached on foot in 20 minutes.
Airport can be reached via public transport in 40 minutes. The closest metro stations are Anton Martin and Sevilla.

Espahotel Gran Vía Madrid is next to Plaza España and half a mile from Puerta del Sol in Madrid. It offers studio apartments with Wi-Fi connection and satellite TV.
The apartments at Espahotel Gran Via have carpet floors and a private bathroom with hairdryer and amenities. There is also a kitchenette with a fridge, and a microwave is available upon request. They all have central heating and air conditioning.
The complex has a 24-hour front desk and offers car rental and laundry services. Room service is also available.
Espahotel Gran Vía is centrally located: the Royal Palace and Theatre is just over a quarter mile from the hotel, and Fuencarral shopping street is less than half a mile away.

Bob W Chueca is a condo hotel featuring rooms with free Wifi and air conditioning in the center of Madrid. The property is close to several well-known attractions – a 12-minute walk from Plaza de España Metro Station, 1.1 miles from Temple of Debod, and a 17-minute walk from Royal Palace of Madrid. The condo hotel also offers facilities for disabled guests.
At the condo hotel, units include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, and towels. A microwave, a toaster, and fridge are also available, as well as a kettle. At the condo hotel, each unit has a seating area.
Popular points of interest near the condo hotel include Gran Via Station Metro Station, Gran Via, and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 7.5 miles from Bob W Chueca.

The stylish Ilunion Alcalá Norte is located in the Madrid, in the north area, within a 10-minute drive of the IFEMA Conference Center and Madrid-Barajas Airport. It offers spacious rooms with free WiFi.
The Ilunion Alcalá Norte’s air-conditioned rooms come with a 43'' flat-screen TV with satellite channels, work desk, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.
The Alcalá’s restaurant offers a daily breakfast, as well as à la carte and daily menus. During the summer months, guests can enjoy their meals on the outdoor terrace. Room service is available during limited hours. There is also a special menu for celiacs and food intolerant guests.
The number 28 bus stops 328 feet away from the property, providing easy access to Madrid city center. The Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 1.9 mi from Ilunion Alcalá Norte.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Located next to the historic center on Puerta de Toledo, this smart hotel has a great breakfast buffet and a lounge bar perfect for relaxing in after visiting the sights.
Prepare for the day ahead with a hearty buffet breakfast in the Hotel Puerta de Toledo. You can choose from a wide selection of hot and cold dishes in the pleasant atmosphere of the Breakfast hall. Breakfast is served from 07:00 until 11:00.
Keep up-to-date and email friends on the free, wireless internet connection available in the Hotel Puerta de Toledo.
From 08:00 until 23:00 you can visit the Hotel Puerta de Toledo’s informal lounge-bar and enjoy a refreshing drink or light snack.
Sleep soundly in the elegant bedrooms which have an attractive color scheme with touches of Mediterranean tones.

Feelathome Ventas Suites offers accommodations in Madrid, 2.4 miles from Gran Via Station Metro Station and 2.4 miles from Santiago Bernabéu Stadium. This recently renovated condo hotel is located 2.2 miles from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and 2.2 miles from Retiro Park. The accommodation features an elevator, luggage storage space, and organizing tours for guests.
The condo hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units offering a desk, a coffee machine, a microwave, a toaster, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with a shower. Free Wifi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms are fitted with a terrace. At the condo hotel, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.
If you'd prefer to cook in the comfort of your own space, you can make use of the kitchen facilities, which include a fridge, kettle, and a stovetop.
Gran Via is 2.7 miles from the condo hotel, while Reina Sofia Museum is 2.8 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas, 5.6 miles from Feelathome Ventas Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

This stylish hotel has a furnished roof terrace with a seasonal hot tub, bar and wonderful views of Madrid. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Atocha Train Station is 1640 feet away.
Hotel Catalonia Atocha is located within 1969 feet of the Reina Sofia and Prado Museums. The lively tapas bars of La Latina are a 10-minute walk away. Antón Martín Metro Station is just 164 feet from the hotel.
The hotel’s air-conditioned rooms are decorated in elegant light colors and have wooden floors.  Each room has a mini-bar and a safe. Bathrooms come with a large shower. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.
The Catalonia Atocha offers a daily buffet breakfast, including local cured meats, cheese and pastries. Traditional Spanish cuisine is served in the restaurant, and there is also a snack bar.

Located in the center of Madrid, the stylish Catalonia Plaza Mayor is at 1969 ft from the Plaza Mayor and within 10 minutes’ walk of the Prado and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museums. It offers a gym, hot tub and free Wi-Fi.
Decorated in neutral tones, the rooms feature modern furnishings and come with a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer.
Hotel Catalonia Plaza Mayor offers a buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at weekends.
The popular tapas bars and restaurants of Plaza Santa Ana are just 656 feet from the hotel. Anton Martin Metro Station is 984 feet away while the Atocha Train Station is 0.6 mi from the hotel. El Retiro Park can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

column9: Double or Twin Room with free airport shuttle
column18:
This modern hotel, with free Wi-Fi, is next to Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport and 5 minutes’ driving from the IFEMA Exhibition Center.
The hotel has 24 hours free shuttle service to the airport and IFEMA, usually at the begining and at the end of the most important fairs. It is also included a free shuttle service to the most important concerts and festivals of the city.
Axor Barajas Hotel offers free access to a modern fitness room and the Wellness Area has an additional cost.
All air-conditioned rooms at Axor Barajas have a 43'' smart TV with Chromecast integrated and wooden floors. The spacious, bright rooms are also soundproofed and heated. There is a safety box, mini-bar and work desk.
Axor Barajas Hotel has a bar and the Mirage restaurant offering Mediterranean food. There is a snack-bar and room service is available. The hotel has a garden and themed lounges, such as the Wii room and the Chill Out Zone.
The hotel offers a laundry service, ironing and dry cleaning service. Meeting and conference rooms are available for a surcharge.
Cívitas Metropolitano Stadium is 4.3 mi from Axor Barajas, while Faunia is 3.1 mi away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 2.5 mi from Axor Barajas.

column4: AC Hotel Los Vascos by Marriott
column17: AC Hotel Los Vascos by Marriott
column18:
AC Hotel Los Vascos is housed in a modern, functional building close to the university in Madrid’s city center. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.
Relax with friends or colleagues in the comfortable AC Lounge for a drink, or have a delicious breakfast without leaving the hotel.
AC Hotel Los Vascos is 10 minutes by car from Gran Via, which runs through the heart of the city. Madrid Airport is 15 minutes away by car and the nearest railway station is just 0.6 mi (half a mile) from the hotel.

Located 5 minutes away by metro from the famous Puerta del Sol in Madrid, One Shot Luchana 22 features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Bilbao Metro Station is 98 feet away.
Most rooms feature a private balcony with views of the city. They have modern décor and parquet floors throughout, and include a flat-screen TV, work desk, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.
One shot Luchana 22  offers a breakfast a la carte, and also has an on-site bar. There is a 24-hour reception, and staff can provide you with tourist information about the area.
You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and bars within a 5-minute walk of One Shot Luchana 22. The famous Plaza España is 2 stops away by metro, and Madrid Royal Palace is 4 stops away. A 7-minute taxi ride will take you to the Prado Museum, next to Retiro Park. Atocha Train Station is 2.2 mi from the property, and Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 12 minutes´ drive away.

Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Hotel Puerta America
The Hotel Puerta America offers exclusive and avant-garde design, by world-famous architects including Norman Foster, Jean Nouvel and Zaha Hadid.
Each floor of the Hotel Puerta America was created by a different international architect. Rooms have 1 queen-size or 2 twin beds, and flat-screen smart TVs with Chromecast audiovisual streaming device.
The hotel restaurant serves modern versions of traditional Spanish food. There is also a terrace and garden, and a top-floor bar with incredible views of Madrid.
Located on Avenida de América Avenue, the Puerta America is just a 5-minute walk from the exclusive Salamanca neighborhood, and Paseo de la Castellana and Bernabéu Football Stadium are both about 30 minutes walk away.
Cartagena Metro Station is just 656 feet from the hotel.

column4: Crowne Plaza Madrid - Centre Retiro, an IHG Hotel
column17: Crowne Plaza Madrid - Centre Retiro, an IHG Hotel
column18:
Located in Madrid, 1.7 miles from Reina Sofia Museum, Crowne Plaza Madrid - Centre Retiro, an IHG Hotel provides accommodations with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use a bar.
Atocha Train Station is 1.8 miles from the hotel, while Retiro Park is 1.1 miles away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 6.8 miles from Crowne Plaza Madrid - Centre Retiro, an IHG Hotel.

In Madrid's upscale Salamanca district, only 215 yards from Parque del Retiro Park and Cibeles Square, One Shot Recoletos 04 offers stylish rooms with 46" flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and spacious rain-effect showers.
Rooms at this hotel also include air conditioning, heating, telephone, safe, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries, bath or rain-effect showers.
One Shot Recoletos 04 is just 325 ft from the pedestrianized Paseo de Recoletos Boulevard and 215 yards from Calle de Recoletos Street, where there are many bars and restaurants.
Banco de España Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and Calle de Serrano, with designer clothes shops is just over half a mile away.

This modern hotel, with a gym, is a 5-minute drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport and IFEMA Convention Center.
Located next to the A2 Motorway, Silken Puerta Madrid is convenient for transport links. The 146 Bus stops in the next street and takes 30 minutes to central Madrid. The 114 bus will take you to the Avenida de América interchange station.
Spacious air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have satellite TV. There is a trouser press, safe and mini-bar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and luxury amenities.
The hotel's La Orza restaurant offers fresh à la carte cuisine, a daily set menu and an extensive wine list. There is also a café where you can choose from a varied menu at lunch or dinner.
There is a 24-hour reception with tourist information. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Cancha de Golf Alcalá 525 Golf Course is 1.9 mi away

This hotel is set in the heart of Madrid, just 656 feet from Puerta de Atocha Station. It offers a fitness room with free mineral water. Free WiFi is available in all areas.
Each stylish room at AC Hotel Atocha is decorated with modern furnishings. They feature air conditioning, a mini-bar and a safe.
The hotel has an elegant bar and the AC Lounge, serving creative versions of traditional dishes.
The AC Hotel Atocha is a 5-minute walk from The Reina Sofia and Botanical Gardens. It is also just 10 minutes’ walk from the Prado Museum.

This hotel is set in the heart of Madrid, just 656 feet from Puerta de Atocha Station. It offers a fitness room with free mineral water. Free WiFi is available in all areas.
Each stylish room at AC Hotel Atocha is decorated with modern furnishings. They feature air conditioning, a mini-bar and a safe.
The hotel has an elegant bar and the AC Lounge, serving creative versions of traditional dishes.
The AC Hotel Atocha is a 5-minute walk from The Reina Sofia and Botanical Gardens. It is also just 10 minutes’ walk from the Prado Museum.

Ilunion Atrium is 10 minutes’ drive from Barajas Airport and the IFEMA Convention Center. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, gym and free WiFi zone. Air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and mini-bar.
Located within the Arturo Soria District, the modern and stylish Atrium Hotel is built around an impressive glass atrium. Madrid city center is 15 minutes away by bus, and there is a stop 164 feet from the hotel.
This cozy rooms have a safe and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms come with a terrace, bathrobe and slippers.
This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.
Seasonal cuisine is offered in the hotel’s modern restaurant, which has a summer terrace. There is a café-bar and room service is available.
You can hire a car from the 24-hour reception and tour desk. On-site parking can be reserved for an extra charge. The hotel is beside the M30 Motorway, has easy access to the Paseo de la Castellana Avenue.

Hotel Nuevo Boston is a design hotel, 10-minute drive from IFEMA Exhibition Center and 5-minute drive from Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. It offers free WiFi and a free airport shuttle service to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, 5-minute drive away.
Rooms at the Nuevo Boston hotel are air-conditioned. They include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and the marble bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is also a safety deposit box and a desk.
Hotel Nuevo Boston has a restaurant, serving modern Mediterranean food, and a café-bar. The dining area features a glass roof and palm trees.
The hotel operates a shuttle service to IFEMA during trade fairs. Nuevo Boston is adapted for guests with reduced mobility.
The hotel has a pool and sun terrace available in the summer.

Offering smart rooms with great views of Casa de Campo Park and Madrid’s Royal Palace, Hotel Acta Madfor is set on Paseo de la Florida, just a few feet from Príncipe Pío Metro Station. It features a 24-hour front desk and a terrace.
Each stylish, air-conditioned room at Hotel Acta Madfor has contemporary décor with dark brown finishes. There is free Wi-Fi, a safe and a flat-screen TV. The slate tile bathroom has free toiletries.
Hotel Acta Madfor offers a lounge area with snacks and breakfast. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found along Paseo de la Florida. The lively La Latina and Puerta del Sol districts can be reached in less than 10 minutes by Metro.
Gran Vía Avenue with its many theaters and shopping is within a 15 minute walk of the Acta Madfor. El Retiro Park, the Museum Triangle and Atocha Train Station can be reached in around 20 minutes by Metro.

Catalonia Puerta del Sol is set in a magnificent 18th-century building in the historic center of Madrid, a few minutes from Puerta del Sol. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
The hotel is just 164 feet from Puerta del Sol, Madrid's main square and from main tapas restaurants. You can walk to Madrid's famous Art Triangle in 15 minutes. Atocha Train Station is 0.6 mi away.
The air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors and smart décor. ach one has flat-screen satellite smart TV with Chromecast app, a private bathroom and a mini-bar.
The Puerta del Sol's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast each morning, and available until 12:00 at weekends. There is also a bar with a roofed terrace, El Patio, where you can get a snack or a drink. There is also a patio with crystal domes.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

These functional apartments lie just off the grand street of Paseo Recoletos, offering spacious and independent accommodations right in the commercial heart of Madrid.
Each unit at Apartamentos Recoletos comes with its own kitchenette, allowing you to prepare your meals as and when you like. Its climate-controlled accommodations also includes a digital TV and full bathroom. Free high-speed WiFi is available. Accommodations is available for people with reduced hearing.
Use this property as a base to stay near Madrid’s famous Calle Serrano – full of some of the city’s most prestigious shops. Also nearby is the charming park of the Retiro. Products for a continental breakfast are served in the room.
Convenient public transport – including the Metro from Colón and Serrano Stations – means you can easily travel around the Spanish capital.

column4: Abalú Small Luxury & Design Boutique Hotel
column17: Abalú Small Luxury & Design Boutique Hotel
column18:
Abalú Small Luxury & Design Boutique Hotel is located 1312 feet from Gran Vía Avenue in central Madrid. It is a boutique hotel offering avant-garde design and the possibility of pre-selecting the scent of your room. Private parking is available on site.
All rooms have been individually designed. They all have air conditioning, heating and a TV. Suites come with a home cinema and Mac laptop.
Staff at the 24-hour reception can help to plan your stay in Madrid. There is also a bicycle rental service and an airport shuttle service on request. Other facilities include a restaurant.
The hotel is well-located in Madrid's trendy Malasaña area and just a 5-minute walk from the lively Chueca district. Both areas are full of popular restaurants and bars.
Plaza de España is just 1312 feet away, and the alternative Fuencarral Market is a 5-minute walk from Abalú Small Luxury & Design Boutique Hotel.

The Hotel Preciados is located in the heart of Madrid, 5 minutes’ walk from the Puerta del Sol. It offers modern services, including free Wi-Fi access and free mini-bar in rooms.
The hotel is housed in a restored 19th-century building. One floor is completely nonsmoking. It also offers well-equipped meeting rooms, a restaurant and a cocktail lounge.
Bedrooms at the Preciados are tastefully decorated, and most have a balcony. There is also satellite TV and a pillow menu.
The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Plaza Mayor and the Royal Palace. It also has excellent public transport connections, with 2 metro stations within 246 feet.

Set in a charming historical building, Hotel Sardinero Madrid is located in central Madrid’s Alonso Martínez Square. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.
The rooms at Hotel Sardinero Madrid feature traditional high ceilings, modern parquet floors and attractive, minimalist décor. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a large rain-effect shower.
The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the bright interior courtyard. There is also an on-site bar, and you can enjoy a drink in the library.
Hotel Sardinero Madrid is located on the edge of the lively Chueca district, and there are numerous charming cafes and tapas bars, as well as vibrant nightlife, within a short walk. Alonso Martínez Metro Station is right outside the Hotel Sardinero Madrid, with Puerta del Sol just 3 stops away.

Conveniently located across from central Madrid's Atocha Station, Hotel Agumar is under a 10-minute walk from the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía Museums. It has simple, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.
A breakfast buffet is served in the Piano Room at Agumar, including fresh fruit and hot dishes. Las Arenas restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and light meals are available at the cafeteria throughout the day.
The rooms feature a marble bathroom equipped with a bathrobe and hairdryer. They also have a safe and a selection of pillows.
Atocha Train Station is 320 yards away, with a high-speed AVE service and services to Barajas Airport. Madrid’s beautiful Retiro Park is also close to the Agumar Hotel.

Hotel Santo Domingo is located in the heart of Madrid, within 492 feet of Gran Via and the Santo Domingo Metro Station. It features a sunroof terrace with a swimming pool and views of the city. The rooms are individually decorated, and offer free WiFi.
The property is composed of two interconnected areas, the main building and the annex building. Guests can relax on our terrace, open all-year round, while enjoying a cocktail and the stunning views of Madrid.
Public parking is available.
The famous Puerta del Sol is 5 minutes' walk from Hotel Santo Domingo, while Plaza Mayor Square and the Royal Palace are within 2625 feet of the property. The Prado Museum, Retiro Park, and the Santiago Bernabeu Stadium are all within 15 minutes from the hotel by metro.

Hotel Porcel Torre Garden offers modern accommodations with free Wi-Fi access and spacious rooms. It is located just 3.1 mi from central Madrid and 10 minutes’ drive from the airport.
The rooms at Torre Garden feature a separate seating area and views. Featuring simple décor, the rooms include air conditioning and satellite TV.
The hotel has good access to the city center by bus or metro. The IFEMA Trade Fair is 15 minutes away by car.
La Torre restaurant is open every day for buffet breakfast. The bar-cafeteria at Torre Garden is open from 08:00 until 23:00 for drinks and snacks.

In a prime location in the center of Madrid, UMusic Hotel Madrid provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a fitness center. Featuring room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The property has entertainment staff and a concierge service.
At the hotel, all rooms have a desk. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a patio. All guest rooms feature a closet.
Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and gluten-free options.
Guests can use the business center or relax in the bar. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area.
Popular points of interest near UMusic Hotel Madrid include Plaza Mayor, Mercado San Miguel and Puerta del Sol. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 8.7 miles from the accommodation.

Espahotel Plaza Basílica is located 10 minutes’ walk from Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid’s financial district. It offers modern apartments with Wi-Fi connection and satellite TV.
All Plaza Basílica apartments are equipped with air conditioning and heating. The bedrooms and living rooms feature carpeted floors.
